name: Skeleton Key
description:
Welcome to the Skeleton Key! This is a collection of 15 games made over the past 5 years by indie game developer FlashChaz & friends!

As the sun sets on Flash and methods of delivering web games change, I wanted to honour my time making Flash games by packing up my favourite releases from the past  5 years into one handy collection!

I thought The Skeleton Key would be a really nice way to cap off what has been a huge part of my life over the years; aside from the games themselves I have packaged up videos for games that never made the cut, prototypes for game ideas I had, soundtracks for the games and other various music bits I've made, a cute little Infodex.pdf with some tips on the collected games and other little bits and bobs that might be of interest to you!

I am hoping to eventually update the games to have no branding or adverts in but this is a little tricky for a few reasons; when it happens you can be sure the collection will be updated! (As well as any additional content I come across I feel is relevent to the collection!)

Whether you're familiar with my games or are just discovering them, I'm sure there's something here for everyone.

All donations are most welcome and are ploughed straight back into doing what I  love...making games!
